snippet: She sickened anddied?--no! far worse!--she became desperate, married a blackguard, andlived a drunkard; the sons were banished for firing at Douglas, as hepassed in his carriage through Thornhill; and the poor mother of thewhole family became--shall I tell it I--an object of charity! Thus was,to my certain knowledge, at least to that of my ancestors, a mostcreditable and well-doing family ruined, root and branch, by thepersecutors--or, in other words, by those who, without knowing what theydid, regarded the "Covenant" as an unholy thing, and fought the foremostin the ranks of oppression and uniformity.
